items.question: What types of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I build fullstack web applications, APIs, showcase websites, dashboards and complete DevOps solutions.

items.question: What are your delivery timelines?
items.answer: Timelines vary based on project complexity. A showcase website typically takes 2-4 weeks, a complex web application 2-3 months.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance contracts to ensure your applications run smoothly and stay up to date.

items.question: How does a project work?
items.answer: Each project starts with a discovery phase, followed by design, development, testing and deployment.
